Today in County Clare, surf is rolling in at 3 ft @9s W with fresh 17 mph SSE winds. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are your best bets, offering some clean options despite the wind. Tomorrow, conditions improve significantly with swell building to 5 ft @15s WNW and light 7 mph S winds, making for a great day at spots like Doolin Point and Lahinch. On the day after, surf remains fun at 3 ft @12s WNW, with light 4 mph SSW winds, keeping it playful at the usual spots. Best: tomorrow.
